name: The Mystery of Winchester Museum
description:
The Mystery of The Winchester Museum:

Someone is pulling  a prank and put you inside the Museum! without windows and doors and yet you are given the freedom to explore!

The Map of the Museum changes to your liking and may unlock new locations, but as you go deeper inside this place you will find out that some rooms are way too dangerous as some knowledge are meant to be kept

find your way out of the Museum! or find the reason behind everything ...

controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D

Jump: space 

action: Q

must have a unity web player installed

note: this is a demo game and some ambient musics are just temporary
